Very interesting learning curve but once you've become familiar with the spray patterns and physics, it can become addicting to play. Each game is different with the same end goal and although there is toxicity and cheaters, CS:GO has a very good system for removing them from the game effectively.
SUCH A NICE GAME FOR SPEND TIME .
